snippet: New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady knocked himself out of Thursday's preseason game against the Chicago Bears after he cut his thumb on a pair of scissors by accident, according to media reports....
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady knocked himself out of Thursday's preseason game against the Chicago Bears after he cut his thumb on a pair of scissors by accident, according to media reports.

headline.main: Brady Cuts Himself Out of Preseason Start
headline.print_headline: Brady Cuts Himself Out of Preseason Start
